rows.label: qev093003_MSG0010
rows.name:
Nothing yet.
Your forebear's Skells refuse to surface...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0020
rows.name:
Perhaps the ruins of Cauldros really have
nothing to do with Qlurians?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0030
rows.name: No, I'm sure that they do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0040
rows.name:
I took a good look around the Cloister.
It was incredibly subtle, but there WERE traces of the Qlu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0050
rows.name:
It's starting to look like Samaarian worship took a radical turn.
Very different to the peaceful faith it once was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0060
rows.name:
There's a high probability that we'll find them here.
The problem is, where to look...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0070
rows.name:
Hmm...
Perhaps we should try thinking more central.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0080
rows.name: Central, you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0090
rows.name:
From the records we have to go on, we know that a king
once ruled here. A civilization under an almighty monarch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0100
rows.name:
This place was once the royal capital.
Now, where would a king take his seat?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_JNK0110
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev093003_SEL0120
rows.name:
Venture that he would likely
govern from a castle.

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0130
rows.name: Yes, yes he would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_JNK0140
rows.name: Pass the Buck

rows.label: qev093003_SEL0150
rows.name: Ask Celica for her opinion.

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0160
rows.name:
Whaâ€” You want me to answer?
...Somewhere a king would reside...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0170
rows.name: In a castle, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0180
rows.name: Excellent guess, Celica.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0190
rows.name:
For a variety of reasons, throughout history,
castles have been a mainstay of sovereign power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0200
rows.name:
The castle... Both a threshold between ruler and governed,
and a bulwark against foreign invaders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0210
rows.name:
A means of defense...
Just as the Skells are, you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0220
rows.name:
It's a possibility.
Now, time to check our theory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev093003_MSG0230
rows.name:
Onward to O'rrh Sim Castle.
We're sure to find answers there.[ST:wait ]
